thread.title: Life sentence sought for Pa. man who used a lab as front for drug making - pennlive.com
thread.title_full: Life sentence sought for Pa. man who used a lab as front for drug making - pennlive.com

author: John Beauge
title: Life sentence sought for Pa. man who used a lab as front for drug making - pennlive.com
text:
WILLIAMSPORT — The government is seeking a life sentence for the Montour County man jurors found was using his scientific research lab as a front to make fentanyl and its variants.
But the attorney for Anthony D. Bressi contends a sentence of time served plus a fine would be sufficient.
The probation office’s pre-sentence report recommends a sentence in the range of 30 years to life.
